businesses.name: The Pastry Lounge
businesses.business_details:
Since Melbourne's best venues and events have been forced to close, we are now selling family size pies and other meals as well as our much loved sweet tarts.
The pastry Lounge is creating new products using our signature handmade pastry.
(There's range of Gluten free endorsed by Coeliac Australia and Vegan products too!)
We are offering home delivery in Melbourne extending to the Mornington Peninsula, West Coast and around Victoria.
businesses.product_details: We are local food manufacturer in Mitcham with HACCP certification and refrigerated vehicles.
businesses.new_products:
- New products including family size pies - check our website!
- Home Delivery
businesses.headline: The Pastry Lounge
